attributes.action: stop allowing get out clauses for companies to use with regard to employment laws, sales of goods acts and lots more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sales of goods act states that items that go faulty only need to be replaced after used after a "REASONABLE TIME". If goods are to be repaired under warranty they have to be returns within "A REASONABLE TIME"
Employment law gives reasons why people can be legally dismissed, last one being "SOME OTHER SUBSTANSIAL REASON" This is just a few examples
This petition is to request the government to stop putting get out clauses in laws, which big companys can blatently flout. The law is the law and should be rigid and applicable to everyone!!
